good service
Free flow of orange juice: good

Dear guest, I am very happy to know from your message that I have left such a good impression on you. I hope you can continue to pay attention to Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel in the future and tell us more about your feelings and experiences when you stay in the future. , We sincerely look forward to your visit again! Manager: Zhao Dan
